input.sentences: eating our meal together is a time honored tradition .
after eating some people like to work on the computer .
while other people like to take a nap !
the cat is wondering where his food is at !
output.sentences: We recently had a nice traditional meal.
Although my cousin had to work on his laptop for part of the time.
It was so relaxing my uncle  took a nap.
The cat was mad we didn't give it food.
